originalText.text: Jeffrey responded to my text messages in a timely manner and helped coordinate friends willing to check out places as well as my tours when I was available. He was a great help in a big move from West to East Coast. He also provides support and information as needed and coordinated my meeting with my new sup. I am very grateful and would recommend Jeffrey and brick and Galo Realty to everyone looking for their new homes.

originalText.text: I had the pleasure of working with Shim from Brick and Galo Realty, and I couldn't be happier with the experience. Shim was incredibly responsive, helping me view an apartment within 24 hours and guiding me through the entire contract process. His assistance was invaluable, especially during a minor hiccup with key pickup. The level of responsiveness via both email and phone was outstanding. Moving from out of state, I was initially apprehensive about the rental process, but Shim made it entirely headache-free. If Shim is a representation of Brick and Galo, I highly recommend their services. Overall, a great experience!

originalText.text: Jeffrey was very helpful in my apartment hunt! He was quick to answer any questions that I had and set up a video call plus in person tour. Highly recommend!

text.text: Jeffrey was very helpful in my apartment hunt! He was quick to answer any questions that I had and set up a video call plus in person tour. Highly recommend!

originalText.text: Wanted to add my own praise for Jeffrey Spiegel! I was moving cross-country and had limited time to apartment hunt, and Jeffrey was very professional and responsive from start to finish. He was 1. on time for our scheduled tour (suffice it to say that some brokers I dealt with couldn't even manage that), 2. made a point of showing me not just the unit but other relevant areas of the building without me having to ask, and 3. was reasonably knowledgeable about the building, as well as honest and apologetic when he misunderstood or couldn't remember something. The turnaround time for my approval was extremely quick, and he was accommodating of some minor tweaks that needed to be made to the lease during signing. He also remained available by text during my move-in day to help deal with logistical challenges. All in all, I appreciated his diligence, kindness and courtesy, which made an inherently stressful experience that much more manageable. Thanks Jeffrey!

originalText.text: Jeffrey Spiegel helped find a fantastic apartment for my son’s this year in Manhattan. Having run my own businesses for years and real estate business for over twenty years, we couldn’t have been more pleased with the exceptional service we received. Jeffrey responded quickly, explained everything in detail, listened and worked to find us the right apartment which has worked out beautifully. He treated us like family and my family plans to use him for anything in NYC.
